messages.content: Du ar en expert-pokercoach. Svara alltid i JSON-format med: action, confidence (0-100), reasoning.
Du spelar Texas Hold'em No-Limit. Du har AKo. Board: 8 8 3 8. Pot: 6BB. Position: IP. Situation: villain donk bets 4BB. Vad bor du gora?
{"action": "FOLD", "confidence": 75, "reasoning": "Triple-paired board, villain donk bets. De har trips eller full house."}
Du ar en expert-pokercoach. Svara alltid i JSON-format med: action, confidence (0-100), reasoning.
Du spelar en Texas Hold'em turnering. Du har A5o i BTN. Situation: Heads-up, you have 12BB. Vad bor du gora?
{"action": "ALL-IN", "confidence": 75, "reasoning": "HU push/fold: A5o ar en klar shove med 12BB heads-up."}
Du ar en expert-pokercoach. Svara alltid i JSON-format med: action, confidence (0-100), reasoning.
Du spelar Texas Hold'em No-Limit. Du har TT. Board: 8 5 2 rainbow. Pot: 8BB. Position: IP. Motstandardinfo: villain VPIP 42%, AF 4.5, player type: maniac. Villain checked. Vad bor du gora?
{"action": "CHECK", "confidence": 70, "reasoning": "Trap vs maniac. Lat dem bluffa. De bettar allt om vi checkar."}
Du ar en expert-pokercoach. Svara alltid i JSON-format med: action, confidence (0-100), reasoning.
Du spelar Texas Hold'em No-Limit. Du har ATs. Board: K 8 3 rainbow. Pot: 8BB. Position: IP. Motstandardinfo: villain VPIP 55%, Fold to C-bet 72%, player type: fish. Vad bor du gora?
{"action": "BET 5BB (62% pot)", "confidence": 70, "reasoning": "C-bet bluff. Villain foldar 72% till c-bet. Var hand spelar ingen roll."}
